name: session-keepalive
description: Keeps a web session alive by accessing a page in the background.
author: david@illsley.org

preferences.name: loginUrl
preferences.title: Login URL
preferences.description: Start session keepalive when this addres is visited

preferences.name: keepaliveUrl
preferences.title: Keep Alive Address
preferences.description: Address to access to keep the session alive

preferences.name: logoutUrl
preferences.title: Logout Address
preferences.description: Stop session keepalive when this addres is visited
How frequently to access the Keep Alive Address (minutes)
preferences.name: refreshInterval
preferences.title: Keep Alive Interval
